mapper.select: SELECT class_table.id, class_table.`name`, class_table.major_id `major.id`, major_table.`name` `major.name`, school_table.`name` `major.school.name` FROM class_table INNER JOIN major_table ON class_table.major_id = major_table.id INNER JOIN school_table ON major_table.school_id = school_table.id WHERE class_table.id = #{id};
